thread.title: Volkswagen’s U.S. CEO to face tough questions in congressional hearing
thread.title_full: Volkswagen’s U.S. CEO to face tough questions in congressional hearing - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Volkswagen’s U.S. CEO to face tough questions in congressional hearing
text: WASHINGTON — Volkswagen’s top U.S. executive is expected to face tough questions on Capitol Hill as the emissions-rigging scandal enveloping the world’s largest automaker appears to be deepening. Volkswagen of America CEO Michael Horn is scheduled to testify Thursday before a U.S. House subcommittee investigating last month’s admission the company had installed on-board computer software […] ...
